B

BeaconCharacteristics - com.brtbeacon.sdk.connection中的类
beacon的信息 (battery level, broadcasting power, advertising interval, software 和 hardware version).
BeaconCharacteristics(BrightService) - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.connection.BeaconCharacteristics
 
BeaconConnection - com.brtbeacon.sdk.connection中的类
该类用来客户端连接到ibeacons，读取信息： 提供一些方法改变ibeacon的 UUID, major, minor, advertising interval 和 broadcasting power values.
BeaconConnection(Context, BRTBeacon, ConnectionCallback) - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.connection.BeaconConnection
 
beaconFromLeScan(BluetoothDevice, int, byte[]) - 类 中的静态方法com.brtbeacon.sdk.Utils
Parses scanRecord to look for manufacturer specific data, verifies that and constructs Beacon.
beacons - 类 中的变量com.brtbeacon.sdk.service.MonitoringResult
 
beacons - 类 中的变量com.brtbeacon.sdk.service.RangingResult
 
BRTBeacon - com.brtbeacon.sdk中的类
Immutable representations of single beacon.
BRTBeacon(String, String, String, int, int, int, int) - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.BRTBeacon
 
BRTBeaconManager - com.brtbeacon.sdk中的类
该类用来客户端管理ibeacons，它允许： 扫描beacons 检测 beacons (判断beacon是否进入或者离开范围) 扫描示例: private static final String BRIGHT_PROXIMITY_UUID = "B9407F30-F5F8-466E-AFF9-25556B57FE6D"; private static final Region ALL_BRIGHT_BEACONS = new Region("rid", BRIGHT_PROXIMITY_UUID, null, null); BRTBeaconManager beaconManager = new BRTBeaconManager(context); beaconManager.setRangingListener(new RangingListener() { public void onBeaconsDiscovered(BRTRegion region, final List beacons) { Log.d(TAG, "Ranged beacons: " + beacons); } }); beaconManager.connect(new ServiceReadyCallback() { public void onServiceReady() { beaconManager.startRanging(ALL_BRIGHT_BEACONS); } }); // 当不再需要。
BRTBeaconManager(Context) - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.BRTBeaconManager
 
BRTBeaconPower - com.brtbeacon.sdk中的枚举
Defines BRTBeaconPower of beacon.
BRTBeaconService - com.brtbeacon.sdk.service中的类
不要直接使用这个类，通过BRTBeaconManager使用它
BRTBeaconService() - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.service.BRTBeaconService
 
BRTRegion - com.brtbeacon.sdk中的类
Defines a region based on device's proximity to a beacon.
BRTRegion(String, String, Integer, Integer) - 类 的构造器com.brtbeacon.sdk.BRTRegion
 
BRTRegion.State - com.brtbeacon.sdk中的枚举
